alert.note: Alert for Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Portage, Medina, northwestern Stark, Summit and central Wayne Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Medina to Rittman to Wooster. Movement was east at 30 mph. Low hanging clouds can also appear to move up and down at times, but they will not show signs of any rapid rotation. An actual funnel cloud will exhibit spinning in a counter-clockwise direction. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Akron, Canton, Medina, Wooster, Cuyahoga Falls, Brunswick, Massillon, Kent, Barberton, Green, Solon, Hudson, Wadsworth, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, North Canton, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Orrville and Rittman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
